GR14ss3_paru:3155: janānāṃ śubha-karmādīn pravartayati yaḥ sadā || ity ādi |
GR14ss3_paru:3157: vṛtrāsura-vadhotsiktaṃ tad-bhāgavatam ucyate || ity ādīni ca |
GR14ss3_paru:3158: tasmād bhaga brahma parā viṣṇur bhagavatac-chabdābhinna-varṇatayā tatra
GR14ss3_paru:3159: tatra nirdiṣṭā api bhagavat-pratipādakā eva jñeyāḥ | madhye madhye tv
GR14ss3_paru:3160: ahaṃgrahopāsanā-nirdeśas tat-sāmya iva labdhe hi tad-upāsanā-yogyatā
GR14ss3_paru:3161: bhavatīti | tathā daśa-lakṣaṇartho'py atraiva dṛśyaḥ | tatra sarga-visarga-
GR14ss3_paru:3162: sthāna-nirodhā jandmādy asya yataḥ ity atra | manvantareśānukathane ca
GR14ss3_paru:3163: sthānāntargate poṣaṇaṃ tena ity ādau | ūtir muhyantīty ādau | muktir
GR14ss3_paru:3164: jīvānām api tat-sānnidhye sati kuhaka-nirasana-vyañjake dhāmnety ādau |
GR14ss3_paru:3166: sa ca svayaṃ-bhagavattvena nirṇīyatvāt śrī-kṛṣṇa eveti pūrvokta-prakāra eva
GR14ss3_paru:3167: vyakta iti | tad evam asminn upakrama-vākye sarveṣu pada-vākya-tātparyeṣu
GR14ss3_paru:3168: tasya dhyeyasya saviśeṣatvaṃ mūrtitvaṃ bhagavad-ākāraṃ ca vyaktam | tac ca
GR14ss3_paru:3171: yaḥ sṛṣṭyedam anupraviśya ṛṣiṇā cakra-puraḥ śāsti tāḥ |
GR14ss3_paru:3172: yaṃ sampadya jahāty ajām anuśayī suptaḥ kulāyaṃ yathā
GR14ss3_paru:3173: taṃ kaivalya-nirasta-yonim abhayaṃ dhyāyed ajasraṃ harim || iti |[BhP 10.87.50]
GR14ss3_paru:3174: ato dharmaḥ projjhitety ādāv anantara-vākye'pi kiṃ vā parair ity ādinā
GR14ss3_paru:3177: kasmai yena vibhāsito'yam ity ādi-darśitam tasya tādṛśa-viśeṣavattvādikam |
GR14ss3_paru:3178: yathaiva ātma-gṛhītir itaravad uttarād ity atra (Vs 3.3.16) śaṅkara-
GR14ss3_paru:3180: vācyasyātmatvam upasaṃhārasthād ātma-śabdāl labhyate tadvad ihāpi
GR14ss3_paru:3181: catuḥślokī-vaktur bhagavattvaṃ darśitaṃ ca śrī-vyāsa-samādhāv api tasyaiva
GR14ss3_paru:3182: dhyeyatvam | tad eva ca sva-sukha-nibhṛtetyādi śrī-śuka-hṛdayānugatam
GR14ss3_paru:3187: bhagavatā vibhāsitaḥ prakāśitaḥ na tu tadāpi racitaḥ ayaṃ śrī-bhāgavata-
GR14ss3_paru:3188: rūpaḥ purā pūrva-parārdhādau tad-rūpeṇa brahma-rūpeṇa tad-rūpiṇā śrī-
GR14ss3_paru:3190: rūpeṇa | tad-ātmanety asyottareṇānvayaḥ | tatra tad-ātmanā śrī-śuka-
GR14ss3_paru:3191: rūpeṇeti jñeyam | tad-rūpeṇety ādibhis tribhiḥ padair na kevalaṃ catuḥśloky
GR14ss3_paru:3192: eva tena prakāśitā kiṃ tarhi tatra tatrāviṣṭenākhaṇḍam eva purāṇam iti
GR14ss3_paru:3194: atra mad-rūpeṇa ca yuṣmabhyam iti saṅkocenānukto'pi śrī-sūta-vākya-śeṣo
GR14ss3_paru:3195: gamyaḥ | evaṃ sarvasyāpi śrī-bhāgavata-guror mahimā darśitaḥ | saṅkarṣaṇa-
GR14ss3_paru:3198: tat-paraṃ satyaṃ śrī-bhagavad-ākhyaṃ tattvaṃ dhīmahi | yat tat param
GR14ss3_paru:3199: anuttamam iti sahasra-nāma-stotrāt para-śabdena ca śrī-bhagavān evocyate |
GR14ss3_paru:3200: ādyo'vatāraḥ puruṣaḥ parasyeti dvitīyāt | brahmādīnāṃ buddhi-vṛddhi-
GR14ss3_paru:3201: prerakatvenābhidhānād gāyatryā apy artho'yaṃ grantha iti darśayati | tad
GR14ss3_paru:3207: harir itaratra na gīyate hy abhīkṣṇam |
GR14ss3_paru:3211: virāḍ-antaryāmī nārāyaṇo'pi tat-pālako viṣṇur vāpi na gīyate kvacid gīyate
GR14ss3_paru:3212: vā tatra tv abhīkṣṇaṃ naiva gīyate tu-śabdo'vadhāraṇe sākṣāt śrī-bhagavān
GR14ss3_paru:3213: punar iha śrī-bhāgavate evābhīkṣṇaṃ gīyate | nārāyaṇādayo vā ye'tra
GR14ss3_paru:3214: varṇitās te'py aśeṣā eva mūrtayo'vatārā yasya saḥ | tathābhūta eva gīyate na
GR14ss3_paru:3215: tv itaratraiva tad-avivekenety arthaḥ | ataeva tat tat kathā-prasaṅgair anupadaṃ
GR14ss3_paru:3216: padaṃ padam api lakṣyīkṛtya bhagavān eva pari sarvato-bhāvena paṭhito
GR14ss3_paru:3225: satām ātmanaḥ prāṇeśvarasya yad vā vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī satām ātmanaḥ
GR14ss3_paru:3226: svasya yo bhagavāṃs tasyety arthaḥ | teṣāṃ bhagavati svāmitvena
GR14ss3_paru:3228: eva mukhyam | yasyāṃ vai śrūyamāṇāyām ity [BhP 1.7.7] ādikaṃ ca
GR14ss3_paru:3232: yaṃ brahma varuṇendra-rudra-marutaḥ stunvanti divyaiḥ stavair
GR14ss3_paru:3235: yasyāntaṃ na viduḥ surāsura-gaṇā devāya tasmai namaḥ || [BhP 12.13.1]
GR14ss3_paru:3236: stavair vedaiś ca stunvanti stuvanti | dhyānenāvasthitaṃ niścalaṃ tad-gataṃ
GR14ss3_paru:3244: prathama-draṣṭā jīvo lakṣitaḥ | kair dṛśyair buddhy-ādibhiḥ | tad eva
GR14ss3_paru:3245: dvedhā darśayati dṛśyānāṃ jaḍānāṃ buddhy-ādīnāṃ darśanaṃ sva-prakāśaṃ
GR14ss3_paru:3246: draṣṭāraṃ vinā na ghaṭata jñānopapatti-dvārā lakṣaṇaiḥ sva-prakāśa-
GR14ss3_paru:3247: draṣṭṛa-lakṣakaiḥ tathā buddhy-ādīni kartṛ prayojyāni karaṇatvād
GR14ss3_paru:3249: atha bhagavān api lakṣitaḥ | kena sarva-bhūteṣu sarveṣu teṣu draṣṭṛṣu
GR14ss3_paru:3250: praviṣṭena svātmanā svāṃśa-rūpeṇāntaryāmiṇā | ādau sarvair draṣṭṛbhir
GR14ss3_paru:3251: antaryāmī lakṣitaḥ tatas tena bhagavān api lakṣita ity arthaḥ | sa ca sa ca
GR14ss3_paru:3252: pūrvavat dvidhaiva lakṣyate | tathā hi kartṛtva-bhoktṛtvayor asvātatnrya-
GR14ss3_paru:3253: darśanāt karmaṇo jaḍatvāt karmaṇo jaḍatvāt sarveṣām api jīvānāṃ tatra
GR14ss3_paru:3254: tatra pravṛttir antaḥ-prayojaka-viśeṣaṃ vinā na ghaṭata ity anupapatti-
GR14ss3_paru:3255: dvārāntaryāmī lakṣyate | eṣa hy anenātmanā cakṣuṣā darśayati śrotreṇa
GR14ss3_paru:3256: śrāvayati manasā mānayati buddhyā bodhayati tasmād etā bāhuḥ | mṛtir
GR14ss3_paru:3260: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat || iti |
GR14ss3_paru:3261: viṣṇu-purāṇe ca - sva-śakti-leśāvṛta-bhūta-sarga iti | tathā jīvāḥ prayojaka-

GR14ss3_paru:3268: eko nāneyate tadvad bhagavān śāstra-vartmabhiḥ || [BhP 3.32.33] ity
